text: Hezwan () or Hazwan is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Located in the Aqil mountains, some northeast of the city of Aleppo and northwest of al-Bab, it is administratively part of Nahiya al-Bab of al-Bab District. Nearby localities include Sosyan to the northeast and Ablah to the northwest. In the 2004 census, Hezwan had a population of 1,579. ==References==
title: Hezwan
